verbs.description: russia [V: has] been offloading its us debt holdings at breakneck speed the russian government previously considered a major holder of u s debt has sold the vast majority of its holdings of u s treasury securities treasury department oleg deripaska moscow raymond james new zealand treasury china vladimir putin government of russia japan russia
